Content: @ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉  Will this change in Komodo make my InnoSilicon , and Antminer Z9's no longer able to mine Komodo on your or any other pools?  And do you want me to shut down my miners for a few days while you upgrade  your server software?

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content:
chickenpool will be down for 5-9 minutes ~9 hrs from now for the final daemon swap
provided you properly set up your fail-overs on your miner you will come back to it shortly after it is back up

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: (if you didn't notice the downtime a few hrs ago, then you will not notice it tonight)

Author: spudboy999#5256
Content: Any chance you will also support mining DGB (Digibyte) in the future?  I would love to  move my other miners from Prohashing to Chickenpool for that algo....

Content:

It's been intentionally only equihash and only ecosystem coins since day 1 and I'm not sure how I feel about changing that
